description:
Replace direct state mutations with an event sourcing pattern where all changes to entities (persons, engagements, forums, etc.) are stored as immutable events. This allows full audit trails, temporal queries, and easier debugging of state changes.

**Rationale:** With complex entities and relationship tracking, event sourcing provides natural audit logging, enables time-travel debugging, supports CQRS patterns for read/write optimization, and makes it easier to rebuild state or add new projections without data migration.
title: Implement Event Sourcing for Entity State Management
